casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bernardo Roberto PENA aka Martin Rangel Pena 8P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2018 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Pena, Bernardo Roberto. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*443The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of January 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2018."
